mapper.insert: insert into t_result_visibility ( `student_id`, `checkor_id`, `stereoscopic_viewing_value`, `stereoscopic_viewing_dis`, `adjustment_range_od`, `adjustment_range_oc`, `adjustment_range_ou`, `gather_near_od`, `gather_near_oc`, `gather_near_ou`, `oblique_value`, `oblique_dis`, `before_after_od_value`, `before_after_od_dis`, `before_after_os_value`, `before_after_os_dis`, `check_date`, `delete_flag`, activity_id, yyanwei, zyanwei ) values ( #{studentId}, #{checkorId}, #{stereoscopicViewingValue}, #{stereoscopicViewingDis}, #{adjustmentRangeOd}, #{adjustmentRangeOc}, #{adjustmentRangeOu}, #{gatherNearOd}, #{gatherNearOc}, #{gatherNearOu}, #{obliqueValue}, #{obliqueDis}, #{beforeAfterOdValue}, #{beforeAfterOdDis}, #{beforeAfterOsValue}, #{beforeAfterOsDis}, #{checkDate}, #{deleteFlag}, #{activityId}, #{yyanwei}, #{zyanwei} )
mapper.delete:
delete from t_result_visibility where t_visibility_id in
#{tVisibilityId}
